channel.title: Comments on: SQL Advent 2011 Day 19: Filtered Indexes
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: SQLDenis
item.dc:creator: SQLDenis
item.content:encoded:
Example for Books On Line

CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FIProductAccessories
ON Production.Product (ProductSubcategoryID, ListPrice)
Include (Name)
WHERE ProductSubcategoryID >= 27 AND ProductSubcategoryID <= 36;
GO

item.title: By: David Forck (thirster42)
item.dc:creator: David Forck (thirster42)
item.description: how/could you do this with an index with includes?
item.content:encoded: how/could you do this with an index with includes?
